body.p: This is to Certify That on Thursday the 21st day of Apl 1864 Martin B Debaun a Soldier belonging to Capt J. D. Hales Co.. was put in the Mercer County Jail in This place, by the Soldiers under command of Capt White 37" Ky Mounted Infantry and by his command, & also Thos Leburn put in Jail by order of Capt White

M. V. V Bowen J. M. C
Attest
